attributes.action: Sort out the tax credits fiasco
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Tax credits is a farce the workers are incompitant they are constantly making huge mistakes and expecting the people to cough up the cash to pay for it.
It's about time tax credits changed and improved or shut down altogether.
The incompitance of tax credits is costing tax credit claimants millions.
Many poor families are struggling anyway
without money demands from HRMC tax credits.
We the victims of tax credits have had enough

rejection.details:
This petiton overlaps with several already in existence:

http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/workingtaxcred/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
